verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We shall be changed.
We shall be changed.
We're gonna be changed from mortal to immortality
In the twinkling of an eye.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I'll show you a mystery. (echo)
We shall not all sleep. (echo)
We're gonna be changed to His image.
In the twinkling of an eye.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Death, where is thy sting?
Death, where is thy sting?
Oh, grave, where is thy victory?
Oh, death, where is thy sting?
Death is swallowed up in victory.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
The trumpet shall sound. (echo)
The dead shall be raised. (echo)
And we shall be immortal.
Death is swallowed up in victory.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
/Seremos transformados/ (3)
De mortalidad a la inmortalidad
En un abrir y cerrar de ojos.
/Os digo un misterio/ (2)
/No todos dormiremos/ (2)
Pero todos seremos transformados
En un abrir y cerrar de ojos .
/Se tocará la trompeta/ (2)
/Los muertos serán resucitados / (2)
Y todos seremos transformados
En un abrir y cerrar de ojos
/Dónde está oh muerte tu aguijón/ (2)
Dónde oh sepulcro tu victoria
¡Sorbida es la muerte en victoria!
